


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isInteger ```


Check if the passed value is an integer

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isInteger from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/integer';
isInteger(10) => true
isInteger('hello') => false
```
